Dear Sit
I received today a note from Jim Miles that "the planning
group of the Kellogg project for HA KB will meet January 17, l5,
and 19% Who constitutes this group and who called the meeting?
This seems to me to be another example o something that should
be handled by you and not by the Executive Birector* It raises
again a question which has bothered me more and more recently:
is the President and the Board running HAEB business or is the
Executive Director?
In our discussions at Allerton House last summer and at the
Gotham in September, I thought it was the consensus of the Board
that the Executive Director was a creature of the Board and
should operate by Board direction* It seems to me that Jim is
operating strictly on his own* If this is an unjust criticism
or if. that is the way the Board wants him to operate, then I am
off the beam* Is it a case of the tail wagging the dog or is
it a case of a dogless tail?
Sincerely yours.
